shortdesc.ph: Occurs when the camera focus area changes.

section.p: This callback indicates that the focus area of the camera has changed. This callback is triggered by the local user calling the method to change the focus position.

p.note: This callback is only applicable to mobile terminals.

plentry.pd: @param x x coordinate of the changed camera focus area.
@param y y coordinate of the changed camera focus area.
@param width Width of the changed camera focus area.
The height of the changed focus area.
